title: Learn for Life | Singapore Institute of Technology

meta.description: Through the Learn for Life initiative, all SIT alumni are eligible for a free course offered by SITLEARN.

text_lines: Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Be empowered and invest in your professional development to remain highly sought after in the workforce
Are you seeking opportunities to enhance your skills or acquire new ones while working? As a SITizen, your journey with us does not stop at graduation. Explore SIT
’s industry-relevant courses, thoughtfully curated under 5 key domains.

“I wanted to understand the fundamentals of robotics, from the hardware down to the software aspects. I believe it is important to have an overall view of an area before delving into specific parts of the process. The course was more industry-focused, which helped me understand the direction to which my academic-based efforts would progress onto.”
Attended Robotics Fundamentals and Advanced Robotics courses

"The SIT Postgraduate Certificate modules adhere to such international standards, and in addition also caters to the Singapore local code of practice. This knowledge allows the individual to perform better at work and solve problems better as well. Given Singapore’s competitive job market and globalisation of jobs, it is advisable to constantly upgrade our skillsets. This can also open up other opportunities that we may never have thought of."
Attended The Postgraduate Certificate in Electrical and Electronic Engineering (Modular Certification Pathway)

"Having completed the course and receiving a good basic understanding of the subject, if the opportunity arises, I’m further inclined to take on more advanced or expert-level classes to learn how to put machine learning into practice."
initiative, all SIT alumni can sign up for a complimentary course or module once every five years, valued at up to S$3,500*.
This initiative aims to support you in your journey of upskilling, equipping you with in-demand skills to thrive in today’s dynamic job market. With carefully curated courses from SIT
, you’ll stay ahead of the curve, emerging as a catalyst in your field. Don’t miss out on this opportunity to invest in your future success.
*Based on full course fees, excluding GST.

Be introduced to creative AI, covering generative models, their applications, ethics, and hands-on experience.
In this practical 2-day workshop, learn about the fundamentals, advantages and limitations of Layer of Protection Analysis (LOPA).
Graduate Certificate in Process Safety Operations
Gain expertise in carbon accounting, management, and reporting, including GHG emissions, carbon footprint calculation, mitigation strategies, and alignment with international standards.
Programme Facilitator Training for Community-based Programmes in Falls Prevention and Frailty Management
Learn to administer and lead community programmes for older adults in Singapore - focusing on falls, frailty prevention, and group facilitation.

What is the Learn for Life initiative?
initiative offers SIT alumni a complimentary course or module of their choice once every five years, valued at up to S$3,500*.
*Based on full course fees, excluding GST.
Who is eligible for the Learn for Life?
You are eligible to receive the Learn for Life token as long as you have completed and graduated from any of the undergraduate or postgraduate programmes offered by:
Joint degree by Singapore Institute of Technology and Overseas University partner
One of the Overseas University partners.
The issuance of the Learn for Life token is at the sole discretion of Singapore Institute of Technology.
How do I redeem my complimentary course or module?
section above for instructions on how to claim your complimentary course or module.
What are the courses offered under this initiative?
The eligible courses are tagged as ‘Learn for Life’ and can be found
How often can I redeem the complimentary course or module?
token to redeem a complimentary course or module once every five years.
Will I be eligible for any additional discounts or funding if I utilise the Learn for Life token for the complimentary course or module?

No additional discounts or funding will be applicable if you choose to redeem your complimentary course or module. The value of the complimentary course or module is based on the full course fees, excluding GST.
Am I guaranteed a place in the course of my choice upon registration?
Seats will be allocated on a first-come, first-served basis. Acceptance of your application is subject to seat availability and pre-requisites (if any) and granted at the sole discretion of SIT
Will my Learn for Life token be refunded if I need to withdraw from the course or if the course is cancelled?
You are required to notify SIT
of your withdrawal at least 7 days before the course commences. Failure to do so will result in your
token not being refunded. In the event of course cancellation by SIT
token will be refunded to you. SIT
reserves the right to cancel the course.
What certificate will I be awarded after completion of my chosen course?
Refer to the ‘Certificate and Assessment’ section of each eligible course webpage for details on the certificate to be awarded.
What happens if I don't utilise my Learn for Life token within the specified timeframe?
token will be reissued with a new expiration date set for 5 years from the issuance date. An expired and unutilised
token cannot be carried over to the next 5 years or used to offset future courses.
Can I redeem multiple complimentary courses using a single Learn for Life token?
You may redeem only one complimentary course or module with your
token. Redemption of multiple courses is not allowed.
Can I transfer or gift my complimentary course to someone else?
No, the complimentary course is specifically assigned to you, and the token is linked to your SIT student ID.
How can I stay updated on new courses available for redemption?
If I have more questions about the initiative, courses and/or other queries, who should I contact?
Subscribe now and receive our brochure for the latest updates on our courses, events and insights.
By clicking "Subscribe", you agree to our "

" and also agree that SIT (and its service providers and agents) may collect, use, disclose and/or process your personal data to send you information related to the topic(s) of interest you have selected above, which may include information on courses, seminars, events, resources and/or surveys offered by SIT and/or its Overseas University partners.

We look forward to journeying with you on your path of lifelong learning. You can manage your preferences or unsubscribe at any time through the links provided in our communications. To learn more about how SIT protects your personal data, you may refer to SIT's Personal Data Protection Policy

Exciting news! We are introducing new micro-credentials in Electrical and Electronic Engineering & Infrastructure and Systems Engineering. Be among the first to know by registering your interest today!
SIT reserves the right to make changes to published course information, including dates, times, venues, fees and instructors without prior notice.
Singapore Institute of Technology. All Rights Reserved.

article_texts:
Learn for Life
Be empowered and invest in your professional development to remain highly sought after in the workforce
Are you seeking opportunities to enhance your skills or acquire new ones while working? As a SITizen, your journey with us does not stop at graduation. Explore SIT
LEARN
’s industry-relevant courses, thoughtfully curated under 5 key domains.
“I wanted to understand the fundamentals of robotics, from the hardware down to the software aspects. I believe it is important to have an overall view of an area before delving into specific parts of the process. The course was more industry-focused, which helped me understand the direction to which my academic-based efforts would progress onto.”
Monisha Joy Gomez
Attended Robotics Fundamentals and Advanced Robotics courses
"The SIT Postgraduate Certificate modules adhere to such international standards, and in addition also caters to the Singapore local code of practice. This knowledge allows the individual to perform better at work and solve problems better as well. Given Singapore’s competitive job market and globalisation of jobs, it is advisable to constantly upgrade our skillsets. This can also open up other opportunities that we may never have thought of."
Poh Chye Wei
Attended The Postgraduate Certificate in Electrical and Electronic Engineering (Modular Certification Pathway)
"Having completed the course and receiving a good basic understanding of the subject, if the opportunity arises, I’m further inclined to take on more advanced or expert-level classes to learn how to put machine learning into practice."
Seaw Ker Boon
Attended Machine Learning Courses

initiative, all SIT alumni can sign up for a complimentary course or module once every five years, valued at up to S$3,500*.
This initiative aims to support you in your journey of upskilling, equipping you with in-demand skills to thrive in today’s dynamic job market. With carefully curated courses from SIT
LEARN
, you’ll stay ahead of the curve, emerging as a catalyst in your field. Don’t miss out on this opportunity to invest in your future success.
*Based on full course fees, excluding GST.

Frequently Asked Questions
chevron--up
What is the Learn for Life initiative?
The
Learn for Life
initiative offers SIT alumni a complimentary course or module of their choice once every five years, valued at up to S$3,500*.
*Based on full course fees, excluding GST.
chevron--up
Who is eligible for the Learn for Life?
You are eligible to receive the Learn for Life token as long as you have completed and graduated from any of the undergraduate or postgraduate programmes offered by:
Singapore Institute of Technology,
Joint degree by Singapore Institute of Technology and Overseas University partner
One of the Overseas University partners.
The issuance of the Learn for Life token is at the sole discretion of Singapore Institute of Technology.
chevron--up
How do I redeem my complimentary course or module?
Refer to the
‘Redeem Your Free Course’
section above for instructions on how to claim your complimentary course or module.
chevron--up
What are the courses offered under this initiative?
The eligible courses are tagged as ‘Learn for Life’ and can be found
here
.
chevron--up
How often can I redeem the complimentary course or module?
You can utilise the
Learn for Life
token to redeem a complimentary course or module once every five years.
chevron--up
Will I be eligible for any additional discounts or funding if I utilise the Learn for Life token for the complimentary course or module?
No additional discounts or funding will be applicable if you choose to redeem your complimentary course or module. The value of the complimentary course or module is based on the full course fees, excluding GST.
chevron--up
Am I guaranteed a place in the course of my choice upon registration?
Seats will be allocated on a first-come, first-served basis. Acceptance of your application is subject to seat availability and pre-requisites (if any) and granted at the sole discretion of SIT
LEARN
.
chevron--up
Will my Learn for Life token be refunded if I need to withdraw from the course or if the course is cancelled?
You are required to notify SIT
LEARN
of your withdrawal at least 7 days before the course commences. Failure to do so will result in your
Learn for Life
token not being refunded. In the event of course cancellation by SIT
LEARN
, the
Learn for Life
token will be refunded to you. SIT
LEARN
reserves the right to cancel the course.
chevron--up
What certificate will I be awarded after completion of my chosen course?
Refer to the ‘Certificate and Assessment’ section of each eligible course webpage for details on the certificate to be awarded.
chevron--up
What happens if I don't utilise my Learn for Life token within the specified timeframe?
Any unutilised
Learn for Life
token will be reissued with a new expiration date set for 5 years from the issuance date. An expired and unutilised
Learn for Life
token cannot be carried over to the next 5 years or used to offset future courses.
chevron--up
Can I redeem multiple complimentary courses using a single Learn for Life token?
You may redeem only one complimentary course or module with your
Learn for Life
token. Redemption of multiple courses is not allowed.
chevron--up
Can I transfer or gift my complimentary course to someone else?
No, the complimentary course is specifically assigned to you, and the token is linked to your SIT student ID.
chevron--up
How can I stay updated on new courses available for redemption?
Join our mailing list
here
.
chevron--up
If I have more questions about the initiative, courses and/or other queries, who should I contact?
You may contact us
here
.

updateCheckboxVal("Interest_BCD");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ENG");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_FCB");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_HSS");
    updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ICT");

    function updateCheckboxVal(attrName) {
        if (attrName) {
            var checkboxName = attrName + "_checkbox";
            var intAttr = document.getElementsByName(attrName);
            var intCheckbox = document.getElementsByName(checkboxName);
            if (intCheckbox && intAttr) {
                intAttr[0].value = intCheckbox[0].checked;
            }
        }
    }

    function updatesUponSubmit() {
        var checkboxes = document.querySelectorAll('[data-group="check-box-group"]');
        var boxSelected = false;
        for (var i = 0, l = checkboxes.length; i < l; i++) {
            if (checkboxes[i].checked) {
                boxSelected = true;
                break;
            }
        }
        if (boxSelected) {
            var gmt8Date = new Date().toLocaleDateString("en-US", { timeZone: "Asia/Singapore" });
            const now = new Date().toUTCString();
            var optinEmailDate = document.getElementsByName("OptinEmailDate");
            var createdDate = document.getElementsByName("CreatedDate");
            var formSubmissionDate = document.getElementsByName("FormSubmissionDate");
            var primaryKey = document.getElementsByName("PrimaryKey");
            var getEmail = document.getElementById("email").value;
            var getWebsource = document.getElementById("websourceID").value;

            optinEmailDate[0].value = now;
            createdDate[0].value = now;
            formSubmissionDate[0].value = now;
            primaryKey[0].value = getEmail + getWebsource + gmt8Date;
			
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_BCD");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ENG");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_FCB");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_HSS");
            updateCheckboxVal("Interest_ICT");

        } else {
            var checkboxes = document.querySelector('.error-message');
            checkboxes.classList.add('active');
            return false;
        }
    }
#block-announcement-popup {
 display: none;
}
